K_S1C1.title: First Steps
K_S1C1.goal: Move the turtle forward to the target.
K_S1C1.learningObjective: Learn the 'forward(n)' command and understand that computers follow instructions in sequence.

K_S1C2.title: A Simple Turn
K_S1C2.goal: Turn the turtle to face the target, then move forward.
K_S1C2.learningObjective: Learn the 'turn(d)' command for changing direction.

G1_S1C1.title: Pen Colors
G1_S1C1.goal: Draw a red line, then a blue line.
G1_S1C1.learningObjective: Learn the 'penColor(c)' command to change the turtle's trail color.

G1_S1C2.title: Lift the Pen
G1_S1C2.goal: Move to a new spot without drawing a line.
G1_S1C2.learningObjective: Learn 'penUp()' and 'penDown()' to control when the turtle draws.

G1_S1C5.title: Draw a Square with a Loop

G2_S1C1.title: My First Function
G2_S1C1.goal: Define a sequence of commands to draw a shape, then call it.
G2_S1C1.learningObjective: Understand the concept of abstraction by defining and calling a simple function.

G2_S1C2.title: Function with Parameters
G2_S1C2.goal: Create a function that takes a 'size' parameter to draw shapes of different sizes.
G2_S1C2.learningObjective: Learn how to make functions more flexible with parameters.
